channel.title: CVE Feed for VICIdial -- VICIdial
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VICIdial -- VICIdial

item.title: CVE-2022-34879|2024-09-16T20:47:06.832Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in AST Agent Time Sheet interface (/vicidial/AST_agent_time_sheet.php) of VICIdial via agent, and search_archived_data parameters. This issue affects: VICIdial 2.14b0.5 versions prior to 3555.

item.title: CVE-2022-34876|2024-09-16T17:23:59.824Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: SQL Injection vulnerability in admin interface (/vicidial/admin.php) of VICIdial via modify_email_accounts, access_recordings, and agentcall_email parameters allows attacker to spoof identity, tamper with existing data, allow the complete disclosure of all data on the system, destroy the data or make it otherwise unavailable, and become administrators of the database server. This issue affects: VICIdial 2.14b0.5 versions prior to 3555.

item.title: CVE-2024-8504|2024-09-12T13:52:49.969Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: An attacker with authenticated access to VICIdial as an "agent" can execute arbitrary shell commands as the "root" user. This attack can be chained with CVE-2024-8503 to execute arbitrary shell commands starting from an unauthenticated perspective.

item.title: CVE-2024-8504|2024-09-10T19:23:39.327Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: An attacker with authenticated access to VICIdial as an "agent" can execute arbitrary shell commands as the "root" user. This attack can be chained with CVE-2024-8503 to execute arbitrary shell commands starting from an unauthenticated perspective.

item.title: CVE-2024-8503|2024-09-10T19:36:08.120Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can leverage a time-based SQL injection vulnerability in VICIdial to enumerate database records. By default, VICIdial stores plaintext credentials within the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-8503|2024-09-10T21:02:45.121Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can leverage a time-based SQL injection vulnerability in VICIdial to enumerate database records. By default, VICIdial stores plaintext credentials within the database.
